settings.question: A HUG-IN-A-MUG THAT'S SIMPLY GOOD. INSPIRED BY AYURVEDA
settings.answer: Moong Pani Golden Mung Sipping Broths are delicious and nutritious, uniquely made from sprouted mung beans, Italian herbs and turmeric.

settings.question: Plant-based, 100% natural whole ingredients, vegan, gluten-free, non-GMO, keto-friendly, soy-free, nut-free, and yeast-free.
settings.answer: Italian herbs like basil, rosemary, oregano together with turmeric are know for aiding soothing digestion and boosting immunity. One cup of Moong Pani broth has just 35 calories and packs a punch of dietary power.
